Description: Danelectro 59MJ Black Metalflake Excellent condition, with only minimal visible play wear. Frets are in great shape with very little wear. All electronics fully functional. This model features the fully adjustable wraparound bridge, so intonation is excellent. Plays great, and the lipstick pickups sound superb. Watch the short demo video below for a small sampling of tones! Will ship FedEx in the continental US. Thanks for looking! Specs from Dano below: Danelectro's 59MJ is destined to take the stage. Dressed in an eye-catching metal flake finish this classic double-cutaway features Danelectro's newly redesigned '56 Lipstick pickups that come closer than ever to the sound of the originals. Using stacked volume and tone controls and a 3-way pcikup selector, you'll find all the vintage tones you need. A full 25" scale length with 21 frets and adjustable die-cast bridge keep playing comfortable and in tune.
